name: xrltletrd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: mp2and(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))

stmt.origin: syl3anc(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))

comment: Transitive law for ordering on extended reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
